body_html:
Hi @ma0ho
Just to make sure I understand it correctly: are you trying to use a 1-dimensional filter with both height and width as 1, and the feature map count being 401, or are you trying to use a filter with size [1, 401] and a feature map count as 1?
tensorflow's conv2d requires filter to be of the following format:
A 4-D tensor of shape [filter_height, filter_width, in_channels, out_channels]
So if I change the filter to [1, 1, 1, 401], it actually outputs the correct OOM error:
ResourceExhaustedError: OOM when allocating tensor with shape[720,401,400,600].

body:
Hi @ma0ho 
Just to make sure I understand it correctly: are you trying to use a 1-dimensional filter with both height and width as 1, and the feature map count being 401, or are you trying to use a filter with size [1, 401] and a feature map count as 1?
tensorflow's conv2d requires filter to be of the following format:
A 4-D tensor of shape [filter_height, filter_width, in_channels, out_channels]
So if I change the filter to [1, 1, 1, 401], it actually outputs the correct OOM error:
ResourceExhaustedError: OOM when allocating tensor with shape[720,401,400,600].
